A worker in Morrisville who was in a car accident w ICE this morning. He's currently in the WakeMed Brier Creek Emergency Department, had a knee injury. I wasn't able to get all the details clearly, but I think he was rammed by the agents (on purpose or by accident), tried to move his car off the road, at which point they rammed him on purpose, totalled his car. He got out of the car, knee injured and "todo mareado", they pointed guns at him on the sidewalk, grabbed him and shoved him to the ground, hit his head. At that point they finally asked if he was hurt, and he said yes his knee was hurt, and he said yes, his knee was injured, and so the ambulance was called. He was at Brier Creek Hospital, and then was detained upon discharge around 2pm on 12/2. He was then held for two days at Wake County Sheriff's Office, and is being federally charged with ramming his vehicle into federal agents' vehicles (which he disputes). His next hearing is 12/10, where he will be assigned a public defender.

Family lives in Washington, NC. She went in for her interview at 9am. Had an interperter with them. "I already read over your file, i don't need you - they said to interpeter and daughter" They said they'd talk to her only. Attorney was on the call the whole time. In the middle of the interview, the ICE agents came in and arrested it. The agent that was doing the interview had said they were going to approve it but then the ICE agents interpetted to arrest us. Permanent Residency -- Work permit that was good until Nov 2030 - had just renewed it. Julie Solonan in Marlyand. She had legal parole. She had a deportation from 1998 but was never notified. 2023 was let in legally. In '98 had an attorney who made them sign things and had things sent to a PO box that she did not have access to. Attorney has already sent an emergency motion to reopen the case. She's not coming up on the ICE locator. Judy Bary (Greg Murphy) - works for her - has poltical connections - has worked for her 30 years - republican donor.

Three vehicles with federal agents stopped them, rammed their car, got out with automatic rifles, pulled them out of the vehicle, detained her husband, and took him away. They had left their children at school, and when they were heading back home, several black SUVs with tinted windows stopped them, rammed their car in the middle of the street, and were carrying very large weapons. They pulled them out of the car and took the husband away. She was handcuffed, threatened with being “shot” if she resisted, and then released.
